replies.body:
{{champion:59}} sigh...

{{champion:102}} Jarvan? What's wrong?

{{champion:59}} Father just told me the other day that he is preparing to step down from the throne so that I can become king. 

{{champion:102}} Well that good news...right?

{{champion:59}} In some ways it is, but in others it is not. 

{{champion:102}} How so?

{{champion:59}} Well if I become King, I have to stay in the Kingdom much more, which means I can't be out in the battle as often.

{{champion:102}} Oh...

{{champion:59}} And the other thing is the condition to become King. I, how do I put this, I have to find a bride. 

{{champion:102}} !!!?

{{champion:59}} The problem is, I don't know if there is anyone that wants to marry me. 

{{champion:102}} Well I am sure that if you look very closely, you will find that the answer is right in front of you. 

{{champion:59}} You are right. How could I have been so blind. Shyvana will you do be a big favor?

{{champion:102}} Anything for you Jarvan.

{{champion:59}} Go get me Blitzcrank. I need to take part in his  Fleshling Compatibility Services.



*To be continue. *


**NOTE: This is a new story I am thinking of doing. A kind of blind dates that he goes on. Now who Jarvan goes on a date with each week will be decided by YOU. The one champ that get the most request will go on the blind date with Jarvan for that next sale, then after that one, the next most requested one, etc. until I grow bored/run out of ideas and end the story. Sooo...besides Shyvana..who do you want his first blind date be with?**
{{champion:64}} hm, blind date?
{{champion:161}} eye get it
{{champion:103}} o haha
{{champion:64}} i dont SEA wat u did there.
{{champion:267}} Me too
{{champion:103}} no tht doesn't work
{{champion:11}} i do

I vote Riven.
{{champion:59}} "So, Riven, why did you decide to come here?"
{{champion:92}} "I don't know, I've got nothing better to do with my time."
{{champion:59}} O.o
{{champion:59}} "It says right here that you are a Noxian-"
{{champion:92}} "DON'T YOU DARE CALL ME THAT!"
{{champion:86}} "Restrain yourself, Riven."
{{champion:59}} "Nonetheless, I cannot marry a Noxian, former or not. Send her away. Garen, who is next?"
{{champion:86}} "Um, Katarina, sir." 
{{champion:59}} (face palm)
So {{champion:55}} has been cheating on {{champion:86}} ...unexpected.

I vote for Lux. :)
*Should change be to me in Jarvan IV's 7th dialogue**

wait, we're forgetting about 1 important demacian girl... {{champion:78}} 

{{champion:78}} i have no wish to be married. there is a crew at Riot who needs some talking to at the moment

{{champion:59}} ... anyone else-

{{champion:133}} Valor! Don't just fly into the throne room. It's not-oh, Jarvan!

{{champion:59}} Ah, Quinn. Your a girl.

{{champion:133}} ... uh, yes.

{{champion:59}} Would you?

{{champion:133}} ...yes?

{{champion:59}} Like to help me find a bride?

{{champion:102}} [face palm]

I do have the story for a Sona one if that get enough votes one day.
on another note, not that anyone read it (minus the general), I am also taking a break from my karthus annie story, mostly out of laziness.
Are we seriously deciding which video game characters should date eachother? Can't we do something to make people that play video games not look like losers?
Well excuse us for having fun.

wait, you know people that DON'T play video games!?
Something seriously wrong here
you're deciding which league of legends character should date eachother. why don't we all go out and find your own girlfriends?
Cause we would be away from league

My husband would prefer I not go {{champion:48}}ing for chicks, actually.  Since I find the grounds for his objection to be fundamentally valid, I intend to honor it and stick to monogamy.  Sorry, no girlfriend searches for me! 

In that case, as last I checked the original issue had to do with HUMOROUS FANFICTION, I vote for {{champion:25}} or {{champion:10}}.  I mean, really, I'd rather read about {{champion:59}} going on a hilarious mistake of a date with pretty much ANYBODY (even {{champion:236}}, who might actually win the hotly-debated title of "Most Depressing Date in the League") than argue on the Internet.  Seriously, people who contribute nothing but derogatory comments and backhanded insults to forums really need to get lives.
I vote for {{champion:267}} {{champion:61}} or {{champion:60}}
{{champion:161}} Eye don't get it

At some point, not this first one, I think {{champion:222}} should somehow catch wind and proposition {{champion:59}} , maybe after {{champion:51}}  or  {{champion:254}} ends up as his 3rd date or something.... Crazy stalker element! {{champion:222}}  could even recur on subsequent blind dates you set {{champion:59}}  up on.... Oh, the possibilities....

I vote Quinn.

Threaten Jarvanna right from the starting line :D
